description: Enable this policy to specify when devices receive Microsoft Defender security intelligence updates during the daily gradual rollout.
name: SecurityIntelligenceUpdatesChannel

options.description: Not configured (Default). The device will stay up to date automatically during the gradual release cycle. Suitable for most devices.
options.name: Not configured (Default). The device will stay up to date automatically during the gradual release cycle. Suitable for most devices.
options.displayName: Not configured (Default). The device will stay up to date automatically during the gradual release cycle. Suitable for most devices.

options.description: Current Channel (Staged): Devices will be offered updates after the release cycle. Suggested to apply to a small, representative part of production population (~10%).
options.name: Current Channel (Staged): Devices will be offered updates after the release cycle. Suggested to apply to a small, representative part of production population (~10%).
options.displayName: Current Channel (Staged): Devices will be offered updates after the release cycle. Suggested to apply to a small, representative part of production population (~10%).

options.description: Current Channel (Broad): Devices will be offered updates only after the gradual release cycle completes. Suggested to apply to a broad set of devices in your production population (~10-100%).
options.name: Current Channel (Broad): Devices will be offered updates only after the gradual release cycle completes. Suggested to apply to a broad set of devices in your production population (~10-100%).
options.displayName: Current Channel (Broad): Devices will be offered updates only after the gradual release cycle completes. Suggested to apply to a broad set of devices in your production population (~10-100%).
